resources.string: Ur yettwaf ara wazalen n uzemz yettwaṭṭfen
Uɣal ɣer unadi n ufaylu deg akk ikaramen yettbanen
Ales amizzwer n ikaraman s uzuɣeṛ (Pro)
Ma yella ɣur-k ikaramen igebren imidyaten, maca ur ten-id-yeɛqil ara usnas, tzemreḍ ad ten-ternuḍ s ufus dagi.\n\nMa terniḍ kra n yiferdisen da, ur d-tessufuɣeḍ ara ula d yiwen ukaram niḍen.
Ulac ifuyla n umidya. Tzemreḍ ad tefruḍ aya s tmerna n ikaramen igebren ifuyla n umidya s ufus.
Ales tisekta n ufran syin sekles
Ma ulac aɣilif, sekcem tabadut tameɣtut
Ales tisekta n waṭas n tugniwin
Ales tisekta n tugniwin s ufmiḍ i d-yettunefken, azal ilaq ad yili gar 10 d 90.
Ur izmir ara ad isnifel afaylu aɣbalu
Asebded am tugna n ugdil ur yeddi ara
Sbadu am tugna n ugdil s:
Tugna n ugdil tettwasbedd akken iwata
Ayagi ad d-iṣṭixer afran akked wid yellan s yikaramen inaddawen si Timidelt Fossify kan. Tzemreḍ ad tesferkeḍ ikaramen yettwaɛezlen deg iɣewwaṛen.

Asṭaxer n yikaramen ad ten-yerr d wid n yikaramen inaddawen imuffiren deg timidelt Fossy kan, ad d-banen daɣen deg yisnasen-nniḍen.\n\nMa tebɣiḍ ad ten-teffreḍ seg yisnasen-nniḍen, seqdec tawuri n tuffirt.
Sken amiḍan n ufaylu deg iqeṛṛa n tgezmi
Ma ulac aɣilif, ẓer dakken tagrawt d ufran d 2 n yigran imunanen
Cfu ɣef umḍiq aneggaru n wurar n tvidyut
Tifawit tafellayt deg uskan n umidya n ugdil aččuṛan
Zzi amidya n ugdil aččuran s
Agilal aberkan deg umidya n ugdil aččuṛan
Sken tawsit n ufaylu n tugna
Sireg asemɣer/asenqes n tvidyut s usiti n snat tikkal fell-as
Sken amḍan n ifuyla deg izirig yemgaraden
Sken amḍan n ifuyla deg tacciwin
Ur d-skan ara amḍan n yifuyla
Talast n izwal n ukaram ɣezzifen ɣer 1 n izirig
Akken ad tetḥeqqeḍ dakken akk timhal n yifuyla tteddunt akken iwata, ttxil-k-m, err asnas-a d asnas n usefrek n Umidya deg yiɣewwaren-ik-im n yibenk.
Awal uffir yettḥuddu ɣef twalit n ukaram yettwaɛezlen
Yella kra n wugur ay yeccḍen, ma ulac aɣilif, ddu ɣer yiɣewwaren-ik-im n yibenk - Isnasen - Akeččum ɣer usnas uzzig - Isnasen n usefrek n Umidya syin sireg asnas-a ad yessefrek amidya.
Ma yella allus n uwelleh ur yetteddu ara, ttxil-k-m, ddu ɣer yiɣewwaṛen n yibenk-ik-im - Isnasen - Akeččum ɣer usnas uzzig - Isnasen n usefrek n Umidya u sireg asnas-a ad yessefrek amidya.
Ma ur tebɣiḍ ara ad t-txedmeḍ, tzemreḍ daɣen ad tkecmeḍ ɣer yiɣewwaren n yibenk-ik-im - Isnasen - Akeččum ɣer usnas uzzig - Isnasen n usefrek n Umidya u ad teǧǧeḍ asnas-a ad yessefrek amidya.
Ma ulac, tzemreḍ ad tkecmeḍ ɣer yifuyla n umidya kan. Ma yella akken, ur tettizmireḍ ara ad txedmeḍ s yifuyla yeffren.
Nadi akk ifuyla deg ubdil n ikaramen, deg ugdil agejdan
Tuffɣa s wazemz ur tetteddu ara akken iwata, amek ara t-ṣeggmeɣ?
Ahat d ayen i d- yeglan ifuyla-nni i d-yettwaneɣlen seg wanda nniḍen. Tzemreḍ ad t-tṣeggmeḍ s ufran n tnfulin n ufaylu akked ufran n \"Ṣeggem azemz s wazal-is\".
Ttwaliɣ kra n yiniten ttlen ɣef tugniwin-nni. Amek ara sselhuɣ taɣara?

Tifrat n tura i uskan n tugniwin tetteddu akken iwata deg tuget n tegnatin meqqren, maca ma tebɣiḍ ugar n tɣara n tugna, tzemreḍ ad tremdeḍ \"Sken tugniwin deg tɣara tunnigt akk\" deg yiɣewwaren n usnas, deg uḥric \"usemɣer/asemẓi n tugniwin s telqayt\".
Ffreɣ afaylu/akaram. Amek ara sekkseɣ tuffra?

Bdu s Android 11 ur tezmireḍ ara ad teffreḍ neɣ ad tekkseḍ tuffra i yifuyla neɣ ikaramen, ur tezmireḍ ara ad twaliḍ wid yeffren deg yisnasen n timidelt ɣef lǧal n tewtilin n unagraw daɣen. Yessefk ad tesqedcemt kra n umsefrak n yifuyla i waya.
Neɣ tzemreḍ daɣen ad d-tefkeḍ anekcum ɣer timidelt-a i yifuyla merra s yiɣewwaren-ik-im n yibenk, ayen ara ɣ-yeǧǧen ad d-nesken iferdisenn yeffren u ad nexdem tigawin n yifuyla s umata.
Acuɣer dayen ur zmireɣ ara ad rnuɣ ikaramen ixuṣṣen?
Aya yeḥbes axeddim ɣef lǧal n ubeddel n unagraw i d-yeddan d Android 11 daɣen, asnas dayen ur yezmir ara ad yesnirem ikaramen n tidet, yettkel ɣef waya umi qqaren MediaStore deg unadi n yisefka.
Acuɣer i ttwaliɣ adellel deg turart n uvidyu?

Isnasen-nneɣ ur sɛin ara akk adellel. Ma twalaḍ-ten deg turart n uvidyu, anamek-is d akken aqli-ik-im tesqedceḍ kra n yisnasen-nniḍen n umyurar n tvidyut. Ɛreḍ ad d-tafeḍ amurar-ik-im n uvidyu amezwer deg yiɣewwaren n yibenk, sakin eg \"Kkes iɣewwaṛen n umezwer\" fell-as. Tikkelt ay d-itteddun aydeg ara d-tnadid ɣef kra n tvidyut, ad twalid amesefren n usnas s tɣawla, anda ay tzemred ad tferned asnas ay tebɣid ad t-tesqedced.
Timidelt n Fossify teḥwaǧ anekcum ummid akken ad d-tesken akk tiwlafin-ik-im d tvidyutin-ik-im. Ruḥ ɣer iɣewwaṛen > Tisirag> Tiwlafin d tvidyutin > Sireg kullec.
Ulac ifuyla n umidya s imzizdigen yettwafernen.
Tawuri-ya tetteffer akaram-nni s tmerna n ufaylu \'.nomedia\' ɣur-s, ad yeffer ula d ikaramen inaddawen akk. ad ten-twaliḍ s usnifel n \"Sken iferdisen yeffren\" deg iɣewwaṛen. Kemmel?
Waqil ur tesɛiḍ ara ikaramen yeffren s ufaylu \".nomedia \".
Yessefk ad tmuddeḍ i usnas anekcum ɣer yifuyla yeffren, ma ulac ur iteddu ara.

plurals.name: failed_to_resize_images
plurals.item: Ur yessaweḍ ara ad yales tisekta n tugna %d
Ur yessaweḍ ara ad yales tisekta n tugniwin %d

resources.string: Tulsa n tsekta n tugniwin tedda akken iwata
Abrid n tugna mačči d ameɣtu
Abrid n uvidyu mačči d ameɣtu
Asiẓreg n tugna ur yeddi ara
Asiẓreg n tvidyut ur yeddi ara
Sireg asemɣer/asemẓi n uḍad deg ugdil aččuran n umidya
Sireg abeddel n umidya s utekki ɣef yidisan n ugdil
Ffer ifatusen yettwasmeɣren ticki afeggag n waddad yeffer
Sken kra n tqeffalin n tigawt deg wadda n ugdil
Ssken Taqecwalt n Yiḍumman deg ugdil n yikaramen
Ssken-d tugniwin s tɣara ifazen akk
Sken-d Taqecwalt n Yiḍumman am uferdis aneggaru deg ugdil agejdan
Sireg ad tmedleḍ timeẓri n ugdil aččuṛan s usɣel ɣer wedda
Ldi yal tikelt tividyutin deg ugdil yemgaraden s yisɣal iglan imaynuten
Sireg tuzzya n tugniwin s tigawt
Asali n umidya ur yeddi ara.
Afaylu ur ittusefrak ara akken iwata neɣ d ameggafsu.
Kkes ikaramen ilmawen mi tekkseḍ agbur-nsen

Tzemreḍ ad tsiteḍ ɣef umuɣ n uferdis n \"Sken iferdisen yeffren\" deg ugdil agejdan, neɣ rmed \"Sken iferdisen yeffren\" deg yiɣewwaren n usnas akken ad twaliḍ aferdis yeffren. Ma tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ tuffra, sit aɣezzfan kan ɣef tqeffalt sakin fren \"Kkes tuffra\". Ikaramen ffren s tmerna n ufaylu \".nomedia\" yeffren deg-sen, tzemreḍ daɣen ad tekkseḍ afaylu s yal amsefrak n ufaylu. Ger tamawt dakken tuffra tetteddu s wudem asnalas daɣen, Ihi ma teffreḍ akaram, ad ffren akk ikaraman yellan ddaw-as. iwakken a d-tekkseḍ tuffra i yikaraman inaddawanen, ilaq ad tekkseḍ tuffra i ukaram agejdan.
Ayɣer ay yettaḍḍaf usnas anect-a akk n tallunt?

Tuffirt n usnas tezmer ad tawi arma d 250MB, ad teḍmen asali n tugna s zreb. Ma yella asnas yeṭṭef ugar n tallunt. ahat ad yili d ssebba n wayen i tesɛiḍ n yiferdasen deg Taqecwalt n yiḍumman. Ifuyla-a ttweḥsaben deg tiddi n usnas. Tzemreḍ ad tsefḍeḍ Taqecwalt n yiḍumman s ulday-ines sakkin ad tekkseḍ akk ifuyla, neɣ seg iɣewwaṛen n usnas. Yal afaylu deg Taqecwalt yettwasfeḍ s wudem awurman seld 30 n wussan.
D acu yeḍran d ufaylu akk d ukaram-nni yeffren, ayɣer ur ttwaliɣ ara akk iferdisen yettwaffren?

Ma yella akaram neɣ yiwen seg ikaramen-is imawlan-is yesɛa tanqiḍt send isem-is, anamek-is d akken yețtwaffer yerna ur yezmir ara ad as-ttwakkes tuffra akka. Ilaq ad tekkseḍ tanqiḍt s ubeddel n yisem-is.
Sireg abeddel n tmeẓri n uktassaɣ
Ffer s wudem awurman anagraw UI deg ugdil aččuṛan
Eǧǧ agdil-nni deg wakud aydeg ara twaliḍ tiwlafin n ugdil ačuṛan
Sireg ad ḥekmeḍ deg tafat n tugna s uḥerrek ubdid
Sireg ad ḥekmeḍ deg ubleɣ n tvidyut d tafat s uḥerrek ubdid
Sken-d amsiḍen n ukaram umidya ɣef tmeẓri tagejdant
Ssken-d ifatusen yettwasmeɣren ɣef umidya n ugdil aččuṛan
Eǧǧ asemɣer n 1:1 s usiti n snat n tikkal
Sken-d taqeffalt n umuɣ i ubeddel n uskan n wakk agbur n Ikaramans s tɣawla
Amidya iɛedda i tzemmar n yibenk.
Amek ara rreɣ timidelt n Fossify d amezwer n yibenk n tmidelt?

Tazwara ilaq-ak ad d-tafeḍ timidelt tamezwert deg weḥric n yisnasen n yiɣewwaren-ik-im n yibenk, nadi ɣef tqeffalt i d-yeqqaren taɣawsa am \"Ldi s wudem amezwer\", sit fell-as, sakin fren \"Sfeḍ imezwar\".Tikkelt i d-iteddun ad tɛerḍeḍ ad teldiḍ tugna neɣ tavidyut ilaq ad twaliḍ amextaf n usnas, anda tzemreḍ ad tferneḍ Timidelt n Fossify u ad tt-terreḍ d asnas amezwer.
Sekkeṛ asnas s wawal uffir, maca ttuɣ-t. D acu i zemreɣ ad t-xedmeɣ?
Ulac amidya n uskan n tmaccagin yettwafen

Tzemreḍ ad t-id-tefruḍ deg 2 n iberdan. Tzemreḍ ad talseḍ asbeddi n usnas, neɣ ad tafeḍ asnas deg iɣewwaṛen n yibenk sakin fren \"Sfeḍ isefka\". Ayagi ad iwennez akk iɣewwaren-ik-im, ur tekkes ara ifuyla n imidyaten.
Amek i zemreɣ ad d-rreɣ album dima yettban-d deg tqacuct?
Amek i zemreɣ ad sleɣ tividyutin s tɣawla ɣer sdat?
D acu n umgirred yellan gar tuffra d ustixer n ukaram?
Acuɣer ikaramen s tduli n uẓawan neɣ isenṭeḍen ttbanen-d?
Sken tanqiḍt n ugdil ma tewjed

Tzemreḍ ad ttekkiḍ ɣef walbum yerna ad tferneḍ tignit usenṭeḍ deg umuɣ n tigawin, aya ad t-yessenṭeḍ ɣer tqacuct. Tzemreḍ ad tsenteḍeḍ aṭas n yikaramen, ad myizwarent iferdisen ittwasenteḍen s tarrayt n usmizzwer amezwer.

Tzemreḍ ad t-tgeḍ s usiti snat n tikkal deg yidis n ugdil, neɣ s usiti n yiḍrisen n tenzagt tamirant neɣ tafellayt zdat n ufeggag n unadi. Ma tremdeḍ tulya n tvidyutin ɣef ugdil i yiman-is deg iɣewwaṛen n usnas, tzemreḍ daɣen ad tesqedceḍ tigawin tiglawanen.

Astixer ur iseḥbes ara askan n ukaram ala deg Timidelt n Fossify, ulamma Tuffra tetteddu deg uswir n unagraw u daɣen akaram ittwaffer seg tmideltin nniden. Iteddu s tmerna n ufaylu ilem \".nomedia \" deg ukaram i d-muddeḍ, sakin tzemreḍ ad tekkseḍ s yal amsefrak n ufaylu. Ger tamawt d akken kra n ibenkan ur ttaǧǧan ara ad ffren ikaramen am tkamiṛat, tuṭṭfiwin n ugdil akked isidar.

Aya yezmer ad yeḍru dakken ad twaliḍ kra n yilbumen ur nennum ara. Tzemreḍ ad ten-stixreḍ s sshala s usiti aɣezzfan fell-asen syin fren Stixer. Di tenkult n udiwenni i d-iteddun tzemreḍ ad tferneḍ akaram amarraw, yezmer lḥal ad yili waya d ayen ara yeǧǧen ikaramen nniḍen ur ttbanen ara.
Akaram s tugniwin ur d-ittban ara, neɣ ur d-ittban ara akk iferdisen. D acu i zemreɣ ad t-xedmeɣ?
Aya yezmer ad yesɛu aṭas n ssebbat, maca yeshel maḍi. Kcem kan ɣer yiɣewwaren -> Sefrek ikaramen yedduklen, fren Ugar sakin inig ɣer ukaram ilaqen.
I ma bɣiɣ ad d-banen kra kan n yikaramen?
Zemreɣ ad neǧreɣ tugniwin s usnas-a?

Ih, tzemreḍ ad tenǧreḍ tugniwin deg umaẓrag, ad tzuɣreḍ tugniwin s tiɣemmaṛ n tugna. Tzemreḍ ad terzuḍ ɣer umaẓrag s usiti ɣezzifen ɣef tugna taqmaḍt, fren Taẓrigt, neɣ fren Taẓrigt seg teskant n ugdil aččuran.
Zemreɣ ad geɣ kra usgrew n tiqmaḍin n ufaylu n umidya?
